item.description:
Happy April Fool's Day!!!  This is no joke we ARE going to have an awesome breakfast at Stephanie's!  These guys know their stuff when it comes to great service and awesome food, so grab those taste buds, your appetite and come on down for an awesome breakfast, conversation, fun and lots of laughter.

 

We will not be seated until everyone is there, so please consider arriving a few minutes early.   We will meet on the front porch and once everyone arrives and the tables are cleared then we will be seated.  We may not sit exactly at the time above, so please be patient.

NOTE:
This event WILL fill up, and it will most likely go fast, there will be a waiting list, if you are on it please be patient as we will be monitoring the RSVP's.  Also if you are on both Circle of Friends and Connections and Friends.  Only put your RSVP on 1 of the sites.  We reserve the right to remove your response if you are a double.

 

Please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues right here at the event.  Thank you!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.

We look forward to seeing you!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be on the potch waiting for everyone to arrive!
item.name: Breakfast at Stephanie's Village Pancake House
